Articles.Content:
The background :

Due to some cloning issues Jeb was not among the crew of the latest manned Duna Mission (first one of new installation).

The Story :

Jeb woke up at the Kerbal cloning center (as he does more than once a day ) and found out that the first manned Duna Mission had left without him. His rage reached peaks never seen before on kerbin and after a few minutes screaming at mission control he came up with a plan.

The VAB building is made of some indestructible material, he knew that since many of his test planes or rockets ended smashing against it, so he decided to scare the hell out of the kerbal engineers and mission control team.

After many hours spent balancing his design Jeb came out with K-Missile rev-7 a completely stock, straight fliyng missile which could be launched from aircrafts, space stations and ground vehicles.

He immediately created some test aircrafts to deliver the new "VAB scaring device", here are F-1 (a compact fighter) and B-3 (long range bomber) planes :

Jeb then found a crate labelled "Damned Robotics", and after a few minutes he came up with 2 ground vehicles for VAB destruction :

After a full day of shooting at the VAB building he forgot about the Duna mission and and went back home happy and relaxed as a true suicidal pilot should be. He fell asleep thanking the Kerbal Gods called Developers for great and free world they had created and the endless possibilities given to him.

http://imgur.com/a/bfW3D#0 imgur album link for full resolution images..
